units.rationale: Describes a concrete experimental workflow combining sequencing and imaging to quantify line composition over time.

units.title: In-depth profiling of PSC line growth rates via longitudinal imaging
units.text: To that end, we undertook an in-depth profiling of the growth rate of 12 different PSC lines by systematic and longitudinal imaging over dif-
units.rationale: Specifies systematic imaging of multiple stem cell lines to measure growth dynamics, a key procedural step.

units.title: Monte Carlo simulations to estimate cell recovery per PSC line
units.text: Monte Carlo simulations incorporating the empirical growth rates from our experiments allowed us to compute the probability of recovering, from each PSC line, a sufficient number of cells a new map.
units.rationale: Outlines a computational method used to predict cell numbers needed for downstream single‑cell analyses.

units.title: eQTL modeling to compare transcriptomes of mosaic cultures

units.rationale: Details the analytical step of applying eQTL modeling to assess genotype‑specific transcriptional effects in mosaic organoids.
